review: Tengo este juego prÃ¡cticamente desde que salio en 2016, y solo puedo decir que es un juegazo. Recomendado

https://store.steampowered.com/app/440/Team_Fortress_2/

Play this instead and have some fun be happy
Downloaded the game just to leave a negative review for this lazy cash grab.

As a kid being a big fan of Team Fortress Two fan I was first on the hate Overwatch band wagon. 
Until I gave the game a chance during its content drought due to the promised future of "Overwatch 2".
Staying around for two seasons of Overwatch but with a 2 slapped on having fun with friends who didn't buy the 1st but the game started to get tiring with contents that was once free being in the new Overwatch shop, old Overwatch 1 items now priced at 10 to 20 bucks for one skin. New players get a sliver of the heroes and new heroes are locked behind a battle pass paywall. The removal of the loot boxes a scummy practice yet was the most fair to the consumer deleted and the free currency given for playing the game now dripped fed you. Promised content not given to the consumers, paywall after paywall. In the end you die as a hero or you live to become the villain and blizzard already chose the latter. This game once was game of the year, now it is a shadow of what it once was. Do not spend money on this game, spend it on some other game or hobbies that try to value your time.

TLDR Overwatch "2" is a shell of what it once was and now is a scummy live service shell of what it once was.

I love this game, but I hate what Blizzard has done with it.

What a fucking embarrassment. How do you fumble what was once so polished, unique, fun, creative, I mean it was an industry standout for christ sakes. I used to shit on Jeff Kaplan as a funny scapegoat kind of figure, but I always felt that he had passion for the franchise. Whatever leech that was once on the underbelly of this game has now completely consumed it. For all the interest and effort that was put in, all thatâ€™s left to show for it is an entropic vapid phylactery for a game industry so aesthetically incentivised that it isnâ€™t even worth experiencing as a â€œfreeâ€ title. But it isnâ€™t free. It cost THE ENTIRE EXISTENCE of Overwatch 1, which had no significant predatory micro-transactional dogshit and had arguably more content because they cut half the maps/gamemodes. It cost the talent and passion of the original team. And it cost me my fucking time. How people still continue to defend the practices of not just the Overwatch Team, but of BlizzardActivision (what a joke btw), when games like Battlefront 2 and No Manâ€™s Sky were RAZED online for similar shit, blows my mind. Overwatch was so initially impressive and praised, its legacy was in constant comparison to TEAM FORTRESS 2. And in a universe where the most recent TF2 update was so desperately fantasized about that the community convinced a company so infamously dormant as VALVE to add simple bug patches and now has a larger active player base than ever before because of it, knowing Overwatch fails to capture an audience on itâ€™s own fucking launcher and has to scramble to spread like the infection it has become to its competitor has to make you wonder how many hands could drop such large a ball. If you purchased anything in game with real money, battle-pass or otherwise, I feel genuinely sorry for you. I understand that I may be coming off as irrationally upset, but I really think that so much opportunity has been intentionally warped to become as selfishly utilized by some fat catâ€™s pocket as possible. If you still care about this gameâ€™s future development, you are being manipulated and gaslit by a suit with a cartoon tongue lolling out of its mouth as it fantasizes about stealing more of your money. For those who are concerned with my lack of critique of the actual gameplay, understand that in the world of bread and circuses, if the bread is stale and maggoty, and the circuses are sad, you look past the tents towards the bigger picture. Maybe once upon a time I would have had the energy to speak in depth about it, but now I can only picture myself a spineless homunculus blindly stumbling around a padded cell whenever I try to think of how to put it. Put plainly, to experience Overwatch 2â€™s gameplay nowadays is to experience tickling the inside of your urethra with a serrated pike.



TLDR: This shit is mad butt doodoo. Iâ€™m plat in ranked so I would know!!!!. Play League of Legends or Warframe instead.
